title: "Google" app is using crazy amount of battery since android 10, Pixel XL
content:
my battery has been crap since the android 10 update and today exceptionally worse. phone has been unplugged for 6 hours (starting at 100%). its barely been used. now at 40%.

"Google" has made up over 20% of the battery usage. and its saying the usage is "while in active use", its not operating in the background. disabling background use didnt change anything. At this rate my battery life has essentially been cut from 20+ hours to less than 12.

is there an update coming that might address this? or am i out of luck...
